data.title: Time Zone & Clock Changes in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, USA
data.meta_description: Historic, present and future dates for daylight saving time and clock changes. Time changes between years 2023 and 2027 in USA – Pennsylvania – Pittsburgh are shown here.

The graph above illustrates clock changes in Pittsburgh during 2024.

Time Changes in Pittsburgh Over the Years

Daylight Saving Time (DST) changes do not necessarily occur on the same date every year.

Time zone changes for:

YearDate & TimeAbbreviationTime ChangeOffset After2023So, 12. Mär, 02:00EST → EDT+1 hour (DST start)UTC-4hSo, 5. Nov, 02:00EDT → EST-1 hour (DST end)UTC-5h2024So, 10. Mär, 02:00EST → EDT+1 hour (DST start)UTC-4hSo, 3. Nov, 02:00EDT → EST-1 hour (DST end)UTC-5h2025So, 9. Mär, 02:00EST → EDT+1 hour (DST start)UTC-4hSo, 2. Nov, 02:00EDT → EST-1 hour (DST end)UTC-5h2026So, 8. Mär, 02:00EST → EDT+1 hour (DST start)UTC-4hSo, 1. Nov, 02:00EDT → EST-1 hour (DST end)UTC-5h2027So, 14. Mär, 02:00EST → EDT+1 hour (DST start)UTC-4hSo, 7. Nov, 02:00EDT → EST-1 hour (DST end)UTC-5h

* All times are local Pittsburgh time. Next time change is highlighted.

Data for the years before 1970 is not available for Pittsburgh, however, we have earlier time zone history for New York available.
